meanings.definition: To pass by gradual or unobservable change.
meanings.sent1: Time glides swiftly when you're having fun.
meanings.sent2: The seasons glide seamlessly from one to the next.
meanings.sent3: The colors of the sunset glide softly into the night.
meanings.sent4: Thoughts glide slowly through his mind like clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The river glides gently past the old mill.
